duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with Shell Prep Lead to meet project goals for coach conversions.
Install plywood and HDPE panels, plumbing, wiring, and insulation.
Collaborate with interior and electrical technicians during installation.
Assist with installation of appliances, audio-visual equipment, HVAC equipment, generators, and wire bundles.
Repair any Shell Prep issues based on findings from road trials.
Provide feedback to design and engineering regarding Shell Prep for changes and improvements.
Attend various meetings in person, by phone, and using web services.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years' experience working with woodworking tools, power tools, and hand tools, and various measuring devices.
Advanced knowledge of wood frame construction, wiring, plumbing terminology, and tools, fasteners, hardware, and methods for building and installing wood and HDPE products.
Ability to read and interpret product specifications, documentation, schematics, and installation instructions.
High level of attention to detail. Able to work in both office and production atmospheres.
